scene_description_enriched: A solitary figure, likely a saint, is depicted seated on a rocky island in a body of water. The figure wears a blue tunic and a reddish-brown mantle, with a halo indicating their sanctity. They are holding a piece of parchment with text. To the right of the figure, a bird, possibly an eagle or a falcon, is perched. The background features a stylized landscape with rolling green hills and a blue sky, suggesting an outdoor setting. The overall scene evokes a sense of contemplation and divine inspiration, often associated with hermits or prophets receiving visions.
scene_interpretation: Saint John the Evangelist on Patmos
